meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>ground</radical> of the <radical>rice paddy</radical> is a <radical>treasure</radical>. As you pull it out of the mucky ground, you can feel your life force being<kanji>renew</kanji>ed.
readingMnemonic: Just as you were getting accustomed to this life <kanji>renew</kanji>ing treasure, <reading>こう</reading>いち comes out of nowhere, stealing your treasure and running off with it.
